articles.author: Kevin Doyle and Sarah Collins
articles.title: Mick Wallace now says he is an 'adviser' to wine bars and gets income of up to €5900 a year - Independent.ie
articles.description: MICK Wallace has amended his declaration of financial interests in the European Parliament to describe himself as an “adviser” to a chain of wine bars.
articles.content:
MICK Wallace has amended his declaration of financial interests in the European Parliament to describe himself as an adviser to a chain of wine bars.
The MEP now says that he earns up 5,988 a year i… [+3394 chars]
